Is there a way to create a normal website page as a 404 page? It looks like I have to create a new template just for the 404 page, and I can’t figure out how to make it using hubl and not a drag and drop template. My master template is non-drag and drop hubl template
Can't you select template type = error page under the Template Type dropdown?

Hi, we have a serious problem with some custom modules with forms inside: we built that modules like 16 months ago and yesterday just start to not work on the different sites where we use it. The forms works while nobody edit the pages, if someone just enter to edit mode, the form disappear and we can’t recover even in the revision history. Our biggest problem is that we know, thanks for the “dependencies” option, that our modules with forms are in more than 300 different website pages and landing pages with 4 different clients. I really need help of some HubSpot dev (if speak Spanish is mucho mejor). Please help us friends :pray:
because of the seriousness of this issue and what time it currently is for most of the U.S. I would try their support by phone or chat.
